QuestData.Title: The Order of the Cloud Serpent
QuestData.Description: The Order of the Cloud Serpent is always searching for talented riders.$B$BIf you wish to follow our way, you should speak to Instructor Skythorn at The Arboretum in the Jade Forest.$B$BI wish you luck, $r.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Instructor Skythorn at The Arboretum in The Jade Forest.
